subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti, the IndyCar Series points leader, won his second pole of the season yesterday at Infineon Raceway in Sonoma, Calif. He will start at the front of the 18-car field in today’s Motorola Indy 300, followed by Danica Patrick, Tony Kanaan and Hélio Castroneves.
